scheme_name: Crop Input Subsidy to the Farmers for Crop Loss Due to Natural Calamities
details: The scheme aims to support farmers whose crops have been damaged by natural disasters such as floods, droughts, unseasonal rains, or other calamities. After a damage assessment is conducted by the district administration, eligible farmers receive compensation based on assistance norms defined by the State Government.
benefits: As per the assistance norms fixed by the State Government, keeping in view the natural calamities that occur from time to time
eligibility: The applicant must be a farmer.
The applicant must be a resident of Gujarat.
The applicant must have suffered crop loss due to natural calamity.
application_process: Step 2: On the home page, click on ‘Schemes’ and then click on ‘Agricultural Schemes’.
Step 3: Now select the scheme, click on the ‘Apply’ button and an application page will open.
Step 4: Click on "Apply New" button and submit a new application.
Step 5: Click on the "Update Application" button to add corrections to the application.
Step 6: Once the application is done, confirm it.
Step 7: Take a print out of the confirmed application.
